// å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼Œaè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œnè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„å¤§å°
public void bubbleSort(int[] a, int n) {
  if (n <= 1) return;
 
 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    // æå‰é€€å‡ºå†’æ³¡å¾ªç¯çš„æ ‡å¿—ä½
    boolean flag = false;
    for (int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; ++j) {
      if (a[j] > a[j+1]) { // äº¤æ¢
        int tmp = a[j];
        a[j] = a[j+1];
        a[j+1] = tmp;
        flag = true;  // è¡¨ç¤ºæœ‰æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢      
      }
    }
    if (!flag) break;  // æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢ï¼Œæå‰é€€å‡º
  }
}

/**
* å†’æ³¡æ’åº
* @param a å¾…æ’åºæ•°ç»„
* @param n æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦

public static void bubbleSort(int[] a, int n) {
if(n<=0) return ;
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
//æ ‡è®°ä¸€æ¬¡å†’æ³¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢ï¼Œè‹¥å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™æ”¹ä¸ºtrue
boolean tag = false;
for (int j = 0; j < n-1-i; j++) {
if(a[j] > a[j+1]){
int temp = a[j];
a[j] = a[j+1];
a[j+1] = temp;
tag = true;
}
}
//è‹¥æœ¬æ¬¡å†’æ³¡æ“ä½œæœªå‘ç”Ÿæ•°æ®äº¤æ¢ï¼Œåˆ™ç»ˆæ­¢å†’æ³¡æ“ä½œ
if (tag == false) break;
}
}

/**
* æ’å…¥æ’åº
* @param a å¾…æ’åºæ•°ç»„
* @param n è¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„å¤§å°
*/
public static void insertSort(int[] a, int n) {
if(n<=1) return;
for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
int value=a[i];
int j=i-1;
//æ‰¾åˆ°æ’å…¥ä½ç½®
for(;j>0;j--){
if(a[j]>value){
a[j+1]=a[j];//ç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®
} else {
break;
}
}
a[j+1]=value;//æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
}

/**
* é€‰æ‹©æ’åº
* @param a å¾…æ’åºæ•°ç»„
* @param n æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦
*/
public static void selectSort(int[] a, int n) {
if(n<=0) return;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
int min=i;
for(int j=i;j<n;j++){
if(a[j] < a[min]) min=j;
}
if(min != i){
int temp=a[i];
a[i]=a[min];
a[min]=temp;
}
}
}

public int[] sort(int[] arr) {
int size = arr.length;
for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
int min = arr[j];
int index = -1;
for(int i = j+1;i < size;i++) {
int a = arr[i];
if(min > a) {
min = a;
index = i;
}
}
if(index > -1) {
int tmp = arr[j];
arr[j] = arr[index];
arr[index] = tmp;
}
}
return arr;
}

/**
* Definition for singly-linked list.
* struct ListNode {
* int val;
* ListNode *next;
* ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}
* ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}
* ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}
* };
*/
class Solution {
public:
ListNode* insertionSortList(ListNode* head) {
if(!head) return head;
ListNode * dummy = new ListNode(0);
ListNode* cur = head;
while(cur){
ListNode* p = dummy;
while(p->next){
if(cur->val >= p->next->val){
p = p->next;
}
else break;
}
ListNode* node = cur->next;
cur->next = p->next;
p->next = cur;
cur = node;
}
return dummy->next;
}
};

// æ’å…¥æ’åº
function insertSort(&$arr) {
$arrLen = count($arr);
if ($arrLen <= 1) return;

for ($i=1;$i<$arrLen;$i++) {
$value = $arr[$i];

for($j=$i-1;$j>=0;$j--) {

if ($arr[$j] > $value) {
$arr[$j+1] = $arr[$j];// ç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®
} else {
break;
}
}
$arr[$j+1] = $value;// æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
}

$arr1 = [4,5,6,3,2,1];

insertSort($arr1);

echo "<pre>";
var_dump($arr1);


// å†’æ³¡æ’åº
function bubbleSort(&$arr) {
$arrLen = count($arr);
if ($arrLen <= 1) return;
for ($i=0;$i<$arrLen;$i++) {
// æå‰é€€å‡ºå†’æ³¡å¾ªç¯æ ‡å¿—ä½
$flag = false;
for ($j=0;$j<$arrLen-$i-1;$j++) {
if ($arr[$j] > $arr[$j+1]) {
$tmp = $arr[$j];
$arr[$j] = $arr[$j+1];
$arr[$j+1] = $tmp;
$flag = true;
}
}
if (!$flag) break;
}
}

$arr2 = [4,5,6,3,2,1];

public int[] selectSort(int[] nums) {
if (nums.length == 1) {
return nums;
}
for (int i = 0, len = nums.length; i < len; i++) {
int min = nums[i];
for (int j = i; j < len - 1; j++) {
min = Math.min(nums[j], min);
}
nums[i] = min;
}
return nums;
}

if (arr[s] > arr[s + 1]) { // äº¤æ¢ä½ç½®

flag = true
}

if (!flag) {

arr[s+1] = arr[s]

}

const selectionSort = (arr) => {

for(let i =0;i<n;i++) {

public class SelectionSort {

public static void sort(int[] arr) {
if(arr.length<=1)
return;

for(int i=0;i<arr.length-1;i++) {
int min_index = i;//æ ‡è®°æœ€å°å…ƒç´ ç´¢å¼•
int j = i+1;
for(;j<arr.length;j++) {
if (arr[min_index]>arr[j]) {
min_index = j;
}
}
//äº¤æ¢æœªæ’åºåŒºé—´ï¼šæœ€å°æ•°ä¸é¦–ä½äº’æ¢ä½ç½®
int v = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[min_index];
arr[min_index] = v;
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
int[] arr = {6,1,3,4,2};
SelectionSort.sort(arr);
for(int i:arr) {
System.out.print(i + " ");
}
}
}

public static void selectionSort(int[] array, int n) {
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
int min = array[i];
int j = i + 1;
// æ‰¾åˆ°æœªæ’åºåŒºæœ€å°å…ƒç´ ä¸‹æ ‡
int flag = i;
for (; j < n; j++) {

flag = j;
}

}
}
}

//å†’æ³¡æ­£æ’åº
func BubbleSort(a []int) []int {
if len(a) < 2 {
return a
}
for i := 0; i < len(a)-1; i++ {
flag := false
for j := i + 1; j < len(a); j++ {
if a[i] > a[j] {
a[i], a[j] = a[j], a[i]
flag = true
}
}
if !flag {
break
}
}
return a
}

//æ’å…¥æ’åº
func InsertionSort(a []int) []int {
if len(a) < 2 {
return a
}
for i := 1; i < len(a); i++ {
for j := i; j > 0; j-- {
if a[j] < a[j-1] {
a[j], a[j-1] = a[j-1], a[j]
} else {
break
}
}
}
return a
}

```
def insert_sort(a):
length = len(a)
if length <= 1:
return
i = 1

while(i < length):
j = 0
while(j < i):
if a[i] < a[j]:
for x in range(j, i+1):
tmp = a[x]
a[x] = a[i]
a[i] = tmp
break
j += 1
i += 1
```

// æ’å…¥æ’åºï¼Œaè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œnè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„å¤§å°
public void insertionSort(int[] a, int n) {
if (n <= 1) return;

for (int i = 1; i < n-1; ++i) {
int value = a[i];
int j = i - 1;
// æŸ¥æ‰¾æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®
for (; j >= 0; --j) {
if (a[j] > value) {
a[j+1] = a[j]; // æ•°æ®ç§»åŠ¨
} else {
break;
}
}
a[j+1] = value; // æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
}

å†’æ³¡æ’åºæœ€å¤–å±‚çš„for å¾ªç¯æ¡ä»¶è¿˜å¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º n-1 ,å‡å°‘ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæœ€åä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯çš„æ—¶å€™å°±åªå‰©ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°äº†ï¼Œä¸çŸ¥é“è¿™æ ·ä¿®æ”¹å¯¹ä¸å¯¹ï¼Œæœ‰æ²¡æœ‰å°ä¼™ä¼´ä¸€èµ·æ¥è®¨è®ºä¸‹

C è¯­è¨€å†™å‡ºé€‰æ‹©æ’åºçš„å®ç°
void selectionSort(int *arr, int n) {
if (n < 2) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n ; i++) {
int min = i;
for (int j = i; j < n; j++) {
if (arr[min] > arr[j]) {
min = j;
}
}
int value = arr[min];
arr[min] = arr[i];
arr[i] = value;
}
}

static int[] insertionSortHead(int[] arr) {
/*æ’å…¥æ’åº-ä»å¤´åˆ°å°¾:å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼Œå·²æ’åºåŒºé—´å’Œæœªæ’åºåŒºé—´ã€‚åˆå§‹å·²æ’åºåŒºé—´åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ã€‚
æ’å…¥ç®—æ³•çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯å–æœªæ’åºåŒºé—´ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œåœ¨å·²æ’åºåŒºé—´ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°åˆé€‚çš„æ’å…¥ä½ç½®å°†å…¶æ’å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿è¯å·²æ’åºåŒºé—´æ•°æ®ä¸€ç›´æœ‰åºã€‚
é‡å¤è¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœªæ’åºåŒºé—´ä¸­å…ƒç´ ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç®—æ³•ç»“æŸã€‚
* 4, 6, 5, 3, 2, 1
* 4 5 6 3 2 1 ï¼ˆ6æ¢5ï¼‰
* 3 4 5 6 2 1 ï¼ˆ4æ¢3ï¼Œ5æ¢4ï¼Œ6æ¢5ï¼‰
* 2 3 4 5 6 1 ï¼ˆ3æ¢2æ¢ï¼Œ4æ¢3ï¼Œ5æ¢4ï¼Œ6æ¢5ï¼‰
* 1 2 3 4 5 6 ï¼ˆ2æ¢1æ¢ï¼Œ3æ¢2ï¼Œ4æ¢3ï¼Œ5æ¢4ï¼Œ6æ¢5ï¼‰
* */
for (int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {

arr[j] = arr[i];

System.out.println("i=" + i + ":" + arr[i] + "ä¸" + arr[j] + "äº’æ¢");

static int[] insertionSortTail(int[] arr) {
/*æ’å…¥æ’åº-ä»å°¾åˆ°å¤´:ä»æœ‰åºåŒºçš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹å¾€å›ä¸€ä¸ªä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒ
* 4 5 6 1 3 2
* 1 4 5 6 3 2 ï¼ˆ1æ¢6,1æ¢5,1æ¢4ï¼‰
* 1 3 4 5 6 2 ï¼ˆ3æ¢6,3æ¢5,3æ¢4ï¼‰
* 1 2 3 4 5 6 ï¼ˆ2æ¢6,2æ¢5,2æ¢4,2æ¢3ï¼‰
* */
for (int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
int val = arr[i];
int index = i - 1;
//æŸ¥æ‰¾æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®
for (; index >= 0; index--) {
if (arr[index] > val) {
arr[index + 1] = arr[index];//æ•°æ®ç§»åŠ¨
} else {
break;
}
}
arr[index + 1] = val;//æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
return arr;
}

static int[] bubbleSort(int[] arr) {

// æå‰é€€å‡ºå†’æ³¡å¾ªç¯çš„æ ‡å¿—ä½
boolean flag = false;

if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {//äº¤æ¢å€¼
int temp = arr[j + 1];
arr[j + 1] = arr[j];

break;

static int[] selectionSort(int[] arr) {
/*é€‰æ‹©æ’åº-å¾ªç¯æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸å…¶ä»–å…ƒç´ æ¯”å¯¹ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œäº¤æ¢ã€‚
* 4, 6, 5, 3, 2, 1
* 1 6 5 3 2 4 ï¼ˆ1æ¢4ï¼‰
* 1 2 5 3 6 4 ï¼ˆ2æ¢6ï¼‰
* 1 2 3 5 6 4 ï¼ˆ3æ¢5ï¼‰
* 1 2 3 4 6 5 ï¼ˆ4æ¢5ï¼‰
* 1 2 3 4 5 6 ï¼ˆ5æ¢6ï¼‰
* */
for (int i = 0; i < arr.length - 1; i++) {
int minIndex = i;
for (int j = i + 1; j < arr.length; j++) {
if (arr[j] < arr[minIndex]) {//æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°å…ƒç´ 
minIndex = j;
}
}
int temp = arr[i];//äº¤æ¢
arr[i] = arr[minIndex];
arr[minIndex] = temp;
}
return arr;
}
è‹¥ä½¿ç”¨ é“¾è¡¨ ä»£æ›¿æ•°ç»„å®ç°ï¼Œ å†’æ³¡æ’åº å’Œ é€‰æ‹©æ’åº éƒ½æœ‰ swap æ“ä½œï¼Œ ä¼šå˜å¾—å¤æ‚ã€‚

è¡¥å……ä¸€ä¸‹ PHP ä»£ç ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¢æˆè¿™æ ·ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯é€‰æ‹©æ’åºå°±ç®—æ˜¯ç¨³å®šæ’åºäº†å‘¢ï¼Ÿ
function selection_sort($arr)
{
$arr_length = count($arr);
if (!is_array($arr) || 0 === $arr_length) {
return [];
}

for ($i = 0; $i < $arr_length; $i++) {
$min= $i;
for ($j = $i + 1; $j < $arr_length; $j++) {
if ($arr[$j] < $arr[$min]) {
$min = $j;
}
}
if ($min != $i) {
// æ–¹å¼ï¼šäº¤æ¢ä½ç½®
/*$temp = $arr[$i];
$arr[$i] = $arr[$min];
$arr[$min] = $temp;*/

// æ–¹å¼ï¼šæ’å…¥ä½ç½®
$temp = $arr[$min];
for ($t = $min - 1; $t >= 0; --$t) {
if ($arr[$t] <= $temp) {
break;
}
$arr[$t+1] = $arr[$t];
}
$arr[$i] = $temp;
}
}

return $arr;
}

void InsertSort(int *a, int len)
{
if (len <= 1)
{
return;
}

for (int i = 1;i < len; ++i)
{
int value = a[i];
int j = i -1;
for(;j >= 0; --j)
{
if (a[j] > value)
{
a[j + 1] = a[j];
}
else
{
break;
}
}

a[j + 1] = value;
}
}

void BubbleSort(int *a, int len)
{
if (len <= 1)
{
return;
}

for(int i = 0;i < len;++i)
{
bool flag = false;
for(int j = 0; j < len - i - 1 ; ++j)
{
if (a[j+1] < a[j])
{
int temp = a[j];
a[j] = a[j+1];
a[j+1] = temp;
flag = true;
}
}

if (!flag)
{
break;
}
}
}

for (int i = intArray.Length - 2; i >= 0; i--)
{
int value = intArray[i];
int j = i + 1;//æ•°ç»„æœ«å°¾
for (; j <= intArray.Length - 1; j++)
{
if (intArray[j] < value)
{
intArray[j-1] = intArray[j];
}
else
{
break;
}
}
intArray[j-1] = value;
}

for i := 0;i< len(array); i ++ {
for k := i;k> 0 && array[k] < array[k-1]; k-- {
array[k],array[k-1] = array[k-1], array[k]

public static void sort(int[] arr){
if(arr.length <= 1){
return;
}
for (int i=1;i<arr.length;i++){
for (int j = i;j>0;j--){
if(arr[j] < arr[j-1]){
int tmp = arr[j];
arr[j] = arr[j-1];
arr[j-1] = tmp;
}else{
break;
}
}
System.out.println(JSON.toJSONString(arr));
}
}

è¿™æ ·çš„å®ç°ç®—æ˜¯æ’å…¥æ’åºï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼Œ è¿™ä¸ªå®ç°æ¯ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µçš„è¾“å‡ºå’Œè¯¾ç¨‹çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚

// å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼Œaè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œnè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„å¤§å°
public void bubbleSort(int[] a, int n) {
if (n <= 1) return;

for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
// æå‰é€€å‡ºå†’æ³¡å¾ªç¯çš„æ ‡å¿—ä½
boolean flag = false;
for (int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; ++j) {
if (a[j] > a[j+1]) { // äº¤æ¢
int tmp = a[j];
a[j] = a[j+1];
a[j+1] = tmp;
flag = true; // è¡¨ç¤ºæœ‰æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢
}
}
if (!flag) break; // æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢ï¼Œæå‰é€€å‡º
}
}

golangå®ç°å†’æ³¡æ’åºå’Œæ’å…¥æ’åº
func SortByBubble(list []int) []int {
if len(list) > 1{
for i := 0; i < len(list); i++ {
for j := 0; j < len(list)-1; j++ {
if list[j] > list[j+1] {
list[j], list[j+1] = list[j+1], list[j]
continue
}
}
}
}
return list
}

func SortByInsertion(list []int) []int {
if len(list) > 1 {
for i := 1; i < len(list); i++ {
tmp := list[i]
for j := i - 1; j >= 0; j-- {
if tmp < list[j] {
list[j+1], list[j] = list[j], tmp
} else {
break
}
}
}
}
return list
}

æˆ‘ç”¨pythonåˆ†åˆ«å®ç°äº†å†’æ³¡ã€æ’å…¥ã€é€‰æ‹©å’Œå¸Œå°”æ’åºï¼Œå¤§å®¶å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹~
def bubble_sort(arr):
#æ¯”è¾ƒ
for i in range(len(arr)-1):
flag=False
#äº¤æ¢
for j in range(len(arr)-i-1):
if arr[j]>arr[j+1]:
arr[j],arr[j+1]=arr[j+1],arr[j]
flag=True
if not flag:
return arr
return arr

def insert_sort(arr):
#éå†æœªæ’åºåŒºé—´ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ 
for i in range(1,len(arr)):
j=i-1
while j>=0 and arr[i]<arr[j]:
arr[j+1]=arr[j]
j=j-1
arr[j+1]=arr[i]
return arr

def selection_sort(arr):
for i in range(len(arr)):
min_index=i

arr[i],arr[min_index]=arr[min_index],arr[i]

def shell_sort(arr):
a=len(arr)
gap=a//2
while gap>=1:
for i in range(a):
j=i
while j>=gap and arr[j-gap]>arr[j]:
arr[j-gap],arr[j]=arr[j],arr[j-gap]
j=j-gap
gap=gap//2
return arr

/**
* å¯¹é“¾è¡¨è¿›è¡Œå†’æ³¡æ’åº
*/
public class BubbleSortLinkList {
public static LinkNode sort(LinkNode head){
LinkNode guard = new LinkNode();
guard.next = head;
int len = head.len();
for (int i = 0; i < len; i++){
// æ¯è½®å°†æœ€å¤§å€¼äº¤æ¢åˆ°æœ€å
LinkNode p = guard;
int j = 0;
boolean isSwap = false;
while (p.next !=null && p.next.next != null && j < len - i){
if (p.next.value > p.next.next.value){
swap(p);
isSwap = true;
}
p = p.next;
j++;
}
if (!isSwap){
//æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿäº¤æ¢ï¼Œè¯´æ˜å·²ç»æœ‰åº
break;
}
}
return guard.next;
}

/**
* äº¤æ¢preçš„åç»§å’Œåç»§çš„åç»§
*
* @param pre å‰é©±èŠ‚ç‚¹
*/
public static void swap(LinkNode pre){
Objects.requireNonNull(pre);
Objects.requireNonNull(pre.next);
Objects.requireNonNull(pre.next.next);
LinkNode a = pre.next;
LinkNode b = pre.next.next;
LinkNode c = pre.next.next.next;
pre.next = b;
b.next = a;
a.next = c;
}
}

githubä¸Šselection_sortçš„æ’åºä»£ç åº”è¯¥æ’åºæ¬¡æ•°æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦å‡1æ¬¡:
```
def selection_sort(arr):
length = len(arr)
if length<=1:
return arr
for i in range(length-1):
min_index = i
min_value = arr[i]
for j in range(i,length):
if arr[j]<min_value:
min_value = arr[j]
min_index = j
arr[i],arr[min_index] = arr[min_index],arr[i]
return arr
```

jsç‰ˆæœ¬çš„é€‰æ‹©æ’åº
function selectionSort(arr){
let len = arr.length
if(len <= 1) return

for(let i = 1; i < len; ++i){
let right_arr = arr.slice(i),
min = Math.min.apply(null, right_arr),
index = arr.findIndex(item => item===min),
j = i - 1;
for(;j >= 0; --j){
if(arr[j] > min){
arr[index] = arr[j]
} else {
break;
}
}
arr[j+1] = min
}
return arr
}

func insertSort(sliceName *[]int) {
// å¦‚æœæ•°ç»„<=1ï¼Œä¸ç”¨æ’åº
if len(*sliceName) <= 1 {
return
}
//xæ˜¯æœªæ’åºåˆ†ç»„
for x := 1; x < len(*sliceName); x++ {
value := (*sliceName)[x]
//yæ˜¯å·²æ’åºåˆ†ç»„
for y := 0; y < x; y++ {
if (*sliceName)[y] > value {
(*sliceName)[x] = (*sliceName)[y]
(*sliceName)[y] = value
value = (*sliceName)[x]
}
}
}
}

é€‰æ‹©æ’åº-Javaå®ç°
private static void sort(int[] arr, int n) {
if (n < 1) return;
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
int k = i;
for (int j = i; j < n; j++) {
if (arr[j] < arr[k]) {
k = j;
}
}
if (k != i) {
int temp = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[k];
arr[k] = temp;
}
}
}

ç”¨æˆ‘çš„æƒ³æ³•æ†‹å‡ºæ¥çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå†™å®Œä¹‹åå°±æœ‰ç‚¹çœ‹ä¸æ‡‚è€å¸ˆå†™çš„äº†... é™·å…¥è‡ªå·±çš„æ€ç»´é‡Œæ— æ³•è‡ªæ‹”
public void insertionSort(int[] a, int n) {
if (n <= 1) return;
for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) { //iä»£è¡¨æœ‰åºåŒºé—´çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®ä¸‹æ ‡

for (int j = i + 1; j > 0; j--) {
if (a[j] < a[j - 1]) {
int less = a[j];
a[j] = a[j - 1];
a[j - 1] = less;
} else {
break;
}
}
}
}

é€‰æ‹©æ’åºJAVAç‰ˆã€‚

public class SelectionSort {
public void sort(int[] array) {
if (array == null || array.length < 2) return;
for (int i = 0; i < array.length - 1; i++) {
int minIndex = i;
for (int j = i + 1; j < array.length; j++) {
if (array[j] < array[minIndex]) {
minIndex = j;
}
}
swap(array, i, minIndex);
}
}

private void swap(int[] array, int firstIndex, int secondIndex) {
int tmp = array[firstIndex];
array[firstIndex] = array[secondIndex];
array[secondIndex] = tmp;
}
}

func Insertion(a []int) {
n := len(a)
if n <= 1 {
return
}
for i := 1; i < n; i++ {
for j := i; j > 0; j-- {
if a[j-1] > a[j] {
a[j-1], a[j] = a[j], a[j-1]
} else {
break
}
}
}
}

public static ArrayList<int []> testSortTime(int n){
ArrayList<int []> arrays = new ArrayList<int[]>(n);
Random random = new Random(1000);
for(int i = 0; i < n;i++){
int [] arr = new int [4000];
for(int j = 0; j < arr.length;j++){
arr[j] = random.nextInt(5000);
}
arrays.add(arr);
}
return arrays;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
//æ¯”è¾ƒä¸åŒæ’åºçš„æ—¶é—´
ArrayList<int []> arra = testSortTime(500);

long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
for (int[] arr : arra) {
//bubbleSort(arr); //bubbleSort: 4066
//insertSort(arr); //insertSort: 697
selectSort(arr); //selectSort: 1951
}
long end = System.currentTimeMillis();
//System.out.println("bubbleSort: "+(end-start));bubbleSort: 4066
//System.out.println("insertSort: "+(end-start));insertSort: 697
System.out.println("selectSort: "+(end-start)); //selectSort: 1951

}

è€å¸ˆï¼Œä½ å¥½ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æ’åºå¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¦‚æœminIndexæ²¡æ”¹å˜çš„è¯åˆ™æ²¡å¿…è¦äº¤æ¢æ•°æ®äº†

//é€‰æ‹©æ’åºç®—æ³•
public static int [] selectSort(int [] array){
int n = array.length;

for(int i = 0;i < n;i++){
int minIndex = i;
for(int j = i+1; j < n; j++){
if(array[minIndex] > array[j]){ //é€‰æ‹©æ’åºä»æœªæ’åºåŒºé—´æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸‹æ ‡
minIndex = j;
}
}
if(minIndex != i){//å¦‚æœæœ€å°å…ƒç´ ä¸‹æ ‡äº§ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜åˆ™äº¤æ¢æ•°æ®
int temp = array[i];
array[i] = array[minIndex];
array[minIndex] = temp;
}
}
return array;
}

func mpSort(array []int ) []int {
if len(array) <=1{
return array
}

var i,j int
for i=1; i< len(array); i++{
var flag = false
for j=0;j<len(array)-i;j++{
if array[j] > array[j+1]{
swap := array[j]
array[j] = array[j+1]
array[j+1] = swap
flag = true
}

}
if flag == false{
break
}
}
return array

}

//æ’å…¥æ’åº
func insertSort(array []int ) []int{
if len(array) <=1{
return array
}

var i,j int

for i=1; i< len(array); i++{
swap := array[i]
for j=i-1;j>=0;j--{
if array[j] > swap{
array[j+1] = array[j]
}else {
break
}

}
array[j+1] = swap

}
return array

}

void insertionSort(int[] a, int n){
if(n < = 1)

for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){

if(a[i] < a[j]){

}
}
}

def BubbleSort(list_,n):
if n<=1:
return list_
for i in range(n):
for j in range(n-i-1):
if list_[j]>list_[j+1]:
a = list_[j]
list_[j] = list_[j+1]
list_[j+1] = a
return list_

def InsertSort(list_,n):
if n<=1:return list_
for i in range(n):
val = list_[i]
for j in range(0,i):
if list_[j]>val:
list_[i] = list_[j]
list_[j] = val
return list_

public int[] insertSort2(int[] source) {
for (int i = 1; i < source.length; i++) {
int j = i;
for (; j > 0; j--) {
if (source[j] < source[j-1]) {
int temp = source[j-1];
source[j-1] = source[j];
source[j] = temp;
}else{
break;
}
}
}
return source;
}

public static void selectSort02(int[] arr) {
int length = arr.length;
if (length <= 1) {
return;
}

for (int i = 0; i < length - 1; i++) {
for (int j = i + 1; j < length; j++) {
if (arr[j] < arr[i]) {
int tmp = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[j];
arr[j] = tmp;
}
}
}

}

public static void insertOrder(int[] a, int n) {
for (int offset = 1; offset < n; offset++) {
int temp = a[offset];

//å½“æŒ‡é’ˆå…ƒç´ åŒ…å«åœ¨(è´Ÿæ— ç©·, å…ƒç´ å€¼)åŒºé—´å†…ï¼Œè¿›å…¥å·²æ’æ•°ç»„ä½ç§»å¹¶æ’å…¥æ“ä½œã€‚å¦åˆ™ç»§ç»­æŒ‡é’ˆä½ç§»ã€‚

if (temp < a[offset - 1]) {
for (int i = offset - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
//å…ƒç´ æ¬ç§»
a[i + 1] = a[i];

//ä¸­æ­¢æ’å…¥æ¡ä»¶ï¼šæ¨ç†ç½®ç©ºä½ç½®ä¸ºå¤´éƒ¨æˆ–è€…ç½®ç©ºä½ç½®å‰ä¸€ä½å°äºç­‰äºtempå€¼
if (i == 0 || temp >= a[i - 1]) {
a[i] = temp;
break;
}
}
}
}
}

function insertSort($arr)
{
$count = count($arr);
for ($i = 1; $i < $count; $i++) {
$value = $arr[$i];
// $i - 1 ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‰åºçš„
for ($j = $i - 1; $j >= 0; $j--) {
if ($arr[$j] > $value) {

}
}
// å¼€å§‹æ¯”è¾ƒå›°æƒ‘ï¼Œä¸ºå•¥æ˜¯$j + 1ã€‚å› ä¸º$j + 1 = $i, è€Œ$içš„å€¼å·²ç»è¢«èµ‹å€¼$value, æ‰€ä»¥$j + 1ç›¸å½“äºç©ºéš™
$arr[$j + 1] = $value;
}

return $arr;
}

function insertSort($arr)

func insertSort(nums []int) {

if l <=1 {
return
}
for i:=1;i<l;i++ {
for j:=0; j<i;j++ {

/**
* è¿™æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨é“¾è¡¨æ¥å®ç°å†’æ³¡æ’åº
*
* @param linkedList
* @param n
*/
public static void bubbleSort(LinkedList<Integer> linkedList, int n) {
if (n < 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
//æå‰é€€å‡ºå†’æ³¡æ ‡è¯†
boolean flag = false;
for (int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; j++) {
if (linkedList.get(j) > linkedList.get(j + 1)) {
int tmp = linkedList.get(j);
linkedList.set(j, linkedList.get(j + 1));
linkedList.set(j + 1, tmp);
flag = true;//è¡¨ç¤ºæœ‰æ•°æ®äº¤äº’
}
}
if (!flag) {
break;
}
}
}

/**
* æ’å…¥æ’åº åŸºäºé“¾è¡¨å®ç°
*
* @param linkedLis
* @param n
*/
public static void insertionSort(LinkedList<Integer> linkedLis, int n) {
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}

//å¾ªç¯å˜é‡é“¾è¡¨
for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
int value = linkedLis.remove(i);
int j = i - 1;
for (; j >= 0; j--) {
if (linkedLis.get(j) < value) {
break;
}
}
linkedLis.add(j + 1, value);
}
}


/**
* é€‰æ‹©æ’åº åŸºäºé“¾è¡¨
*
* @param linkedList
* @param n
*/
public static void selectSort(LinkedList<Integer> linkedList, int n) {
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
int k = i;
//æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°ä¸‹æ ‡çš„å€¼
for (int j = i + 1; j < n ; j++) {
if(linkedList.get(j) < linkedList.get(k)){
k = j;
}
}

//å°†æœ€å°å€¼æ”¾åˆ°æœªæ’åºè®°å½•çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
if(k > i) {
int tmp = linkedList.get(i);
linkedList.set(i, linkedList.get(k));
linkedList.set(k, tmp);
}
}
}

public class SleepSort {

public static void main(String[] args) {

int[] arr = {1,4,7,3,8,9,2,6,5};
//åˆ›å»ºæŒ‡å®šé•¿åº¦çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ•°ç»„
SortThread[] sortThreads = new SortThread[arr.length];
//æŒ‡å®šæ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æ•°ç»„çš„å€¼
for (int i = 0; i < sortThreads.length; i++) {
sortThreads[i] = new SortThread(arr[i]);
}
//å¼€å¯æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹
for (int i = 0; i < sortThreads.length; i++) {
sortThreads[i].start();
}
}
}
class SortThread extends Thread{
int s = 0;
public SortThread(int s){
this.s = s;
}
public void run(){

public class SelectionSort {
public void sort(int[] a ,int n) {
for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
int flag = -1;
for(int j=i;j<n;j++) {
if(a[j]<min) {
min = a[j];
flag = j;
}
}
int temp = a[i];
a[i] = a[flag];
a[flag] = temp;
}
}
}

è€å¸ˆï¼ŒåŸºäºå¿«æ’çš„ç¨³å®šæ€§ï¼Œç½‘ä¸Šå¾ˆå¤šä¸åŒçš„è¯´æ³•ï¼Œè¯´æ˜¯å¾ˆéš¾å®ç°ï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰é¢å¤–çš„ç©ºé—´ï¼Œé‡ç‚¹åœ¨äºpartitionçš„æ“ä½œï¼Œæˆ‘é‡‡ç”¨å…³äºå‰åæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•è¿›è¡Œçš„æ“ä½œï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸ªbigger æŒ‡é’ˆå§‹ç»ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºpivot åˆ†ç•Œå€¼çš„ï¼Œé‡åˆ°å°äºpivot åˆ†ç•Œå€¼çš„ï¼Œå°±äº¤æ¢ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯åªè¦ä¿è¯å¦‚æœç›¸ç­‰çš„æƒ…å†µä¹Ÿè¿›è¡Œäº¤æ¢å°±èƒ½ä¿è¯ç¨³å®šè¡Œäº†å—ï¼Ÿä¸çŸ¥é“æƒ³æ³•å¯¹ä¸å¯¹
public static int partition_(int[] arr, int left, int right ){
int bigger = left;
int pivot = arr[right];
// æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªbigger
int j = left;
for (; j <= right; ++j){
if(arr[j] > arr[right]){
bigger = j;
break;
}
}
if(bigger == left && j-1 == right){
return right;
}
for(int i = j; i < right; ++i){
if(arr[i] <= pivot){
swap(arr, i, bigger);
bigger++;
}
}
if(bigger != right){
swap(arr, bigger, right);
}
return bigger;
}

```java
void bubbleSort(int arr[]) {
if (arr == null || arr.length <= 1) {
return;
}

int len = arr.length;
boolean sorted = true;
for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < len - i - 1; j++) {
if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {
int tmp = arr[j];
arr[j] = arr[j + 1];
arr[j + 1] = tmp;
sorted = false;
}
}

if (sorted) {
break;
}

sorted = true;
}
}
```

æ€è€ƒé¢˜ï¼šç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯å‘å®šã€‚ æ€è·¯ä¸€ ï¼š æå–é“¾è¡¨çš„key ç¨³å®šçš„æ”¾å…¥æ–°æ„é€ çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼› æ€è·¯äºŒï¼š ç›´æ¥æ’åºï¼Œä½†æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨é—´æˆå‘˜çš„äº¤æ¢æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒå¤æ‚çš„ï¼›å¤„ç†çš„å·åªæ˜¯ä¼šè®©ç³»æ•°å˜å¤§ï¼Œå¤šäº†ä½é˜¶é¡¹ã€‚

public static void sort(int[] arr, int n) {
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
/**
* mark the first element of unsorted as minimum
*/
int minimum = arr[i];
int minIndex = i;

/**
* for each of the unsorted elements
* extract the minimum element X
*/
for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
if (arr[j] < minimum) {
minimum = arr[j];
minIndex = j;
}
}

/**
* swap
*/
int temp = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[minIndex];
arr[minIndex] = temp;
}
}

å°è¯•ç€ swift å®ç°äº†ä¸‹é€‰æ‹©æ’åº ä½†æ˜¯æ„Ÿè§‰æœ‰ç‚¹åƒå†’æ³¡å•Š.. ä¸çŸ¥é“å¯¹ä¸å¯¹:
func selectionSort(array:[Int])->[Int]{

var tem = array
for _ in 0...array.count-1{
var sorted = 1
repeat {
var compared = 0
for i in (sorted...tem.count-1-compared).reversed(){
if tem[i] < tem[i-1]{
tem.swapAt(i,i-1)
}
}
compared += 1
sorted += 1
}while sorted == array.count - 1
}

return tem
}

```
public void sort(int[] a, int n) {
if (n <= 1) return;
int min = MAX;
int minIndex = 0;
int middleValue = 0;
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
// å¯»æ‰¾æœ€å°å€¼
for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
if (a[j] < min) { // ç­‰äºçš„æ—¶å€™ä¸ç½®æ¢
minIndex = j
}
}
middleValue = a[j]
a[j] = a[i]
a[i] = middleValue;
}
}
```

#pragma mark -

- (void)selectionSort:(NSMutableArray *)datasource
{
for (NSInteger i = 0; i < datasource.count; i++)
{
NSInteger j = i;

NSNumber *minNumber = datasource[j];
NSInteger index = j;

for (; j < datasource.count; j++)
{
if (minNumber.integerValue > [datasource[j] integerValue])
{
minNumber = datasource[j];
index = j;
}
}

if (index != i)
{
[datasource exchangeObjectAtIndex:index withObjectAtIndex:i];
}
}
}

- (void)shellSort:(NSMutableArray *)datasource
{
NSInteger sublistCount = datasource.count / 2;

while (sublistCount > 0)
{
for (NSInteger i = 0; i < sublistCount; i++)
{
NSMutableArray *subArray = [NSMutableArray array];

for (NSInteger j = 0; j < datasource.count / sublistCount; j++)
{
[subArray addObject:datasource[i + sublistCount * j]];
}
// NSLog(@"subArrayå‰:%@",subArray);

[self insertionSort:subArray];

// NSLog(@"subArray...............................................å:%@",subArray);

for (NSInteger j = 0; j < datasource.count / sublistCount; j++)
{
[datasource replaceObjectAtIndex:i + sublistCount * j withObject:subArray[j]];
}
}

sublistCount = sublistCount / 2;
}
}

public static void sortLinkedList(LinkedList<Integer> linkedList, int n) {
if (linkedList.size() <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < (n - 1) - i; j++) {
int x = linkedList.get(j);//éšæœºè®¿é—®O(n)
int y = linkedList.get(j + 1);//éšæœºè®¿é—®O(n)
if (x > y) {
int temp = x;
linkedList.set(j, y);
linkedList.set(j + 1, temp);
}
}
}
}

void insertSort(int [] a) {

for(int i=1;i<a.length;i++) {

for(int j=i;j>=1; j--) {
if(a[j]<a[j-1]) {
int tmp = a[j-1];
a[j-1] = a[j];
a[j] = tmp;
}
}
}
}

public void insertionSort(int[] a, int n) {
if (n <= 1) return;

for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
int value = a[i];
int j = i - 1;
// æŸ¥æ‰¾æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®
for (; j >= 0; --j) {
if (a[j] > value) {
a[j+1] = a[j]; // æ•°æ®ç§»åŠ¨
} else {
break;
}
}
a[j+1] = value; // æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
}
}

func BubbleSort(array []int32, num int32) {
flag := false
for i := int32(0); i < num; i++ {
flag = false
for j := int32(0); j < num-i-1; j++ {
if array[j+1] < array[j] {
array[j], array[j+1] = array[j+1], array[j]
flag = true
}
}
if !flag { //æ•°ç»„å·²ç»æœ‰åºï¼Œç›´æ¥é€€å‡º
break
}
}
}

//æ•°ç»„çš„æ’å…¥æ’åº,å‡åºï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šæœ€å¥½O(n),æœ€åO(n^2),å¹³å‡O(n^2)ï¼Œç¨³å®šæ’åº
func InsertSort(array []int32, num int32) {
for i := int32(1); i < num; i++ {
value := array[i] //ä¿å­˜ä¸‹è¦æ’å…¥çš„å€¼
j := i - 1
for ; j >= 0; j-- { //æŸ¥æ‰¾æ’å…¥çš„ä½å­
if array[j] > value {
array[j+1] = array[j] // æ¬ç§»æ•°æ®
} else {
break //æ‰¾åˆ°äº†æ’å…¥ä½å­
}
}
array[j+1] = value
}

//æ•°ç»„çš„é€‰æ‹©æ’åº,å‡åºï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šæœ€å¥½O(n^2),æœ€åO(n^2),å¹³å‡O(n^2)ï¼Œä¸ç¨³å®šæ’åº
func SelectSort(array []int32, num int32) {
for i := int32(0); i < num; i++ {
minIndex := i
for j := i + 1; j < num; j++ {
if array[j] < array[minIndex] {
minIndex = j
}
}
array[i], array[minIndex] = array[minIndex], array[i]
}
}

private static void someSort(int[] arr) {
int len = arr.length;
if (len == 1) return;

for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
for (int j = i + 1; j < len; j++) {
if (arr[i] > arr[j]) {
int tmp = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[j];
arr[j] = tmp;
}
}
}
}

public static void bubbleSort(int[] a) {
int n = a.length;
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
for (int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; ++j) {
if (a[j] > a[j + 1]) {
swap(a, j, j + 1);
}
}
}
}

public static void insertionSort(int[] a) {
int n = a.length;
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
int value = a[i];
int j = i - 1;
while (j >= 0) {
if (a[j] > value) {
a[j + 1] = a[j];
j--;
} else {
break;
}

}
a[j + 1] = value;
}
}

public static void selectionSort(int[] a) {
int n = a.length;
if (n <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
int min = i;
for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j) {
if (a[min] > a[j]) {
min = j;
}
}
swap(a, min, i);
}
}

private static void swap(int[] a, int i, int j) {
int temp = a[i];
a[i] = a[j];
a[j] = temp;
}

for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
